1: וַיְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> דְבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>Moreover the word</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֵלַ֥י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>came unto me saying</n>
2: בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Son</n> אָדָ֕ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of man</n> שִׂ֥ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>set</n> פָּנֶ֖יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>thy face</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> הַ֣ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>against mount</n> שֵׂעִ֑יר <sup>8165 </sup> <n>Seir</n> וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <sup>5012 </sup> <n>and prophesy</n> עָלָֽיו׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n>
3: וְאָמַ֣רְתָּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And say</n> לּ֗וֹ כֹּ֤ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto it Thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> הִנְנִ֥י <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> אֵלֶ֖יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>I am against</n> הַר־ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>Behold O mount</n> שֵׂעִ֑יר <sup>8165 </sup> <n>Seir</n> וְנָטִ֤יתִי <sup>5186 </sup> <n>I [am] against thee and I will stretch out</n> יָדִי֙ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>mine hand</n> עָלֶ֔יךָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> וּנְתַתִּ֖יךָ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>against thee and I will make</n> שְׁמָמָ֥ה <sup>8077 </sup> <n>desolate</n> וּמְשַׁמָּֽה׃ <sup>4923 </sup> <n>thee most</n>
4: עָרֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>thy cities</n> חָרְבָּ֣ה <sup>2723 </sup> <n>waste</n> אָשִׂ֔ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>I will lay</n> וְאַתָּ֖ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> שְׁמָמָ֣ה <sup>8077 </sup> <n>and thou shalt be desolate</n> תִֽהְיֶ֑ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will become</n> וְיָדַעְתָּ֖ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and thou shalt know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I [am] the LORD</n>
5: יַ֗עַן <sup>3282 </sup> <n>Because</n> הֱי֤וֹת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have had</n> לְךָ֙ אֵיבַ֣ת <sup>342 </sup> <n>hatred</n> עוֹלָ֔ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>Because thou hast had a perpetual</n> וַתַּגֵּ֥ר <sup>5064 </sup> <n>and hast shed</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>[the blood of] the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>unto</n> יְדֵי־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>by the force</n> חָ֑רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>of the sword</n> בְּעֵ֣ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>in the time</n> אֵידָ֔ם <sup>343 </sup> <n>of their calamity</n> בְּעֵ֖ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>in the time</n> עֲוֹ֥ן <sup>5771 </sup> <n>[that their] iniquity</n> קֵֽץ׃ <sup>7093 </sup> <n>[had] an end</n>
6: לָכֵ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>therefore</n> חַי־ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>Therefore [as] I live</n> אָ֗נִי <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> נְאֻם֙ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>GOD</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לְדָ֥ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>thee unto blood</n> אֶעֶשְׂךָ֖ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>I will prepare</n> וְדָ֣ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>and blood</n> יִרְדֲּפֶ֑ךָ <sup>7291 </sup> <n>shall pursue</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>thee sith</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> דָ֛ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>blood</n> שָׂנֵ֖אתָ <sup>8130 </sup> <n>thou hast not hated</n> וְדָ֥ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>even blood</n> יִרְדֲּפֶֽךָ׃ <sup>7291 </sup> <n>shall pursue</n>
7: וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Thus will I make</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַ֣ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>mount</n> שֵׂעִ֔יר <sup>8165 </sup> <n>Seir</n> לְשִֽׁמְמָ֖ה <sup>8077 </sup> <n>most</n> וּשְׁמָמָ֑ה <sup>8077 </sup> <n>desolate</n> וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <sup>3772 </sup> <n>and cut off</n> מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>who</n> עֹבֵ֥ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>from it him that passeth out</n> וָשָֽׁב׃ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and him that returneth</n>
8: וּמִלֵּאתִ֥י <sup>4390 </sup> <n>And I will fill</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָרָ֖יו <sup>2022 </sup> <n>his mountains</n> חֲלָלָ֑יו <sup>2491 </sup> <n>with his slain</n> גִּבְעוֹתֶ֤יךָ <sup>1389 </sup> <n>[men] in thy hills</n> וְגֵאוֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>1516 </sup> <n>and in thy valleys</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲפִיקֶ֔יךָ <sup>650 </sup> <n>and in all thy rivers</n> חַלְלֵי־ <sup>2491 </sup> <n>that are slain</n> חֶ֖רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>with the sword</n> יִפְּל֥וּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>shall they fall</n> בָהֶֽם׃
9: שִֽׁמְמ֤וֹת <sup>8077 </sup> <n>desolations</n> עוֹלָם֙ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>thee perpetual</n> אֶתֶּנְךָ֔ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>I will make</n> וְעָרֶ֖יךָ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>and thy cities</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> [תֵישַׁבְנָה כ] (תָשֹׁ֑בְנָה <sup>3427 </sup> <n>abide</n> ק) וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and ye shall know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I [am] the LORD</n>
10: יַ֣עַן <sup>3282 </sup> <n>Because</n> אֲ֠מָרְךָ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Because thou hast said</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁנֵ֨י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>These two</n> הַגּוֹיִ֜ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nations</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁתֵּ֧י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>and these two</n> הָאֲרָצ֛וֹת <sup>776 </sup> <n>countries</n> לִ֥י תִהְיֶ֖ינָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> וִֽירַשְׁנ֑וּהָ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>shall be mine and we will possess</n> וַֽיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>it whereas the LORD</n> שָׁ֥ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>was there</n> הָיָֽה׃ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n>
11: לָכֵ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>therefore</n> חַי־ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>Therefore [as] I live</n> אָ֗נִי <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> נְאֻם֮ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִה֒ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> וְעָשִׂ֗יתִי <sup>6213 </sup> <n>I will even do</n> כְּאַפְּךָ֙ <sup>639 </sup> <n>according to thine anger</n> וּכְקִנְאָ֣תְךָ֔ <sup>7068 </sup> <n>and according to thine envy</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשִׂ֔יתָה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>which thou hast used</n> מִשִּׂנְאָתֶ֖יךָ <sup>8135 </sup> <n>out of thy hatred</n> בָּ֑ם וְנוֹדַ֥עְתִּי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>against them and I will make myself known</n> בָ֖ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אֶשְׁפְּטֶֽךָ׃ <sup>8199 </sup> <n>among them when I have judged</n>
12: וְֽיָדַעְתָּ֮ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>And thou shalt know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> יְהוָה֒ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I [am] the LORD</n> שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי ׀ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>[and that] I have heard</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> נָאָֽצוֹתֶ֗יךָ <sup>5007 </sup> <n>all thy blasphemies</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָמַ֛רְתָּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>which thou hast spoken</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> הָרֵ֥י <sup>2022 </sup> <n>against the mountains</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לֵאמֹ֣ר ׀ <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> [שָׁמֵמָה כ] (שָׁמֵ֑מוּ <sup>8074 </sup> <n>make amazed</n> ק) לָ֥נוּ נִתְּנ֖וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>they are given</n> לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <sup>402 </sup> <n>us to consume</n>
13: וַתַּגְדִּ֤ילוּ <sup>1431 </sup> <n>ye have boasted</n> עָלַי֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> בְּפִיכֶ֔ם <sup>6310 </sup> <n>Thus with your mouth</n> וְהַעְתַּרְתֶּ֥ם <sup>6280 </sup> <n>against me and have multiplied</n> עָלַ֖י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> דִּבְרֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>1697 </sup> <n>your words</n> אֲנִ֖י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> שָׁמָֽעְתִּי׃ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>against me I have heard</n> ס
